SEARCH
Package gutek.entities.algorithms

Class RevisionAlgorithm<T extends CardBase>

java.lang.Object
gutek.entities.algorithms.RevisionAlgorithm<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of card this algorithm will be applied to
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstantCoefficientRevisionAlgorithm, SuperMemo2RevisionAlgorithm
@Entity public abstract class RevisionAlgorithm<T extends CardBase> extends Object
Abstract class representing a revision algorithm for cards. This class defines the common structure for various revision algorithms and includes methods for managing hyperparameters and interacting with the UI. The class is parameterized by a type T that extends CardBase. The revision algorithm is defined as a JPA entity with inheritance strategy InheritanceType.TABLE_PER_CLASS.
